Container.Name: Flowise
Container.Overview: Open source low-code tool for developers to build customized LLM orchestration flow and AI agents.

Config.Name: PORT
Config.Description: The HTTP port Flowise runs on

Config.Name: HTTP Port
Config.Description: The HTTP port Flowise runs on

Config.Name: DATABASE_TYPE
Config.Description: Type of database to store the flowise data

Config.Name: DATABASE_PATH
Config.Description: Location where database is saved (When DATABASE_TYPE is sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_HOST
Config.Description: Host URL or IP address (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_PORT
Config.Description: Database port (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_USER
Config.Description: Database username (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Database password (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_NAME
Config.Description: Database name (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: DATABASE_SSL
Config.Description: Database SSL is required (When DATABASE_TYPE is not sqlite)

Config.Name: STORAGE_TYPE
Config.Description: Type of storage for uploaded files. default is local

Config.Name: BLOB_STORAGE_PATH
Config.Description: Local folder path where uploaded files are stored when STORAGE_TYPE is local

Config.Name: S3_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME
Config.Description: Bucket name to hold the uploaded files when STORAGE_TYPE is s3

Config.Name: S3_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY_ID
Config.Description: AWS Access Key

Config.Name: S3_STORAGE_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
Config.Description: AWS Secret Key

Config.Name: S3_STORAGE_REGION
Config.Description: Region for S3 bucket

Config.Name: SECRETKEY_PATH
Config.Description: Location where encryption key (used to encrypt/decrypt credentials) is saved

Config.Name: FLOWISE_USERNAME
Config.Description: Username to login

Config.Name: FLOWISE_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password to login

Config.Name: APIKEY_PATH
Config.Description: Location where API keys are saved

Config.Name: NUMBER_OF_PROXIES
Config.Description: Rate Limit Proxy

Config.Name: FLOWISE_FILE_SIZE_LIMIT
Config.Description: Maximum file size when uploading

Config.Name: CORS_ORIGINS
Config.Description: The allowed origins for all cross-origin HTTP calls

Config.Name: IFRAME_ORIGINS
Config.Description: The allowed origins for iframe src embedding

Config.Name: DISABLE_CHATFLOW_REUSE
Config.Description: Disable caching the flow, allowing every interaction of the chatflow will be executed from scratch

Config.Name: SHOW_COMMUNITY_NODES
Config.Description: Display nodes that are created by community

Config.Name: Secrets Path
Config.Description: Location where encryption key (used to encrypt/decrypt credentials) is saved

Config.Name: FLOWISE_SECRETKEY_OVERWRITE
Config.Description: Encryption key to be used instead of the key stored in SECRETKEY_PATH

Config.Name: MODEL_LIST_CONFIG_JSON
Config.Description: Link to load list of models from your models.json config file
